name: Heartless (Blastopio)
description:
"Heartless" is a short game where you have to find the love of your life.

Tired of being alone, you choose to rip off your heart from your chest and give it to one last person.
You can see what your target looks like in your head but to get more details you will have to find clues hidden around the map.

I made this game to improve my game development skills back in 2014.
It was not supposed to be released but hey, why not!
Enjoy it!

Features:
 - Change each time you play: NPC clothing and clues position are random
 - Jump to increase your speed and find your target as quickly as possible
 - You can try to give your heart at any time but if you choose the wrong person, you will have a temporary debuff (speed or vision)

Default controls:
 - W,A,S,D : Walk
 - Mouse: Look around
 - Mouse left button: Use
 - Mouse right button: See the clue character
 - Space: Jump

Softwares:
 - Unity 5
 - Blender
 - Ableton Live
 - Photoshop
